metadata.title: CVE-2024-42074 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: amd: acp: add a null check for chip_pdev structureWhen acp platform device creation is skipped, chip->chip_pdev value willremain NULL. Add NULL check for chip->chip_pdev structure insnd_acp_resume() function to avoid null pointer dereference.
